trans-unit.source: Generates internal mappings to .NET Framework types for XML schema element declarations, including literal XSD message parts in a WSDL document.
Expands upon the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter> to provide additional functionality for typed datasets.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension"></xref> class.

Expands upon the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter> to provide additional functionality for typed datasets and generates internal mappings to .NET Framework types for XML schema element declarations, including literal XSD message parts in a WSDL document.
To be added.
Generates internal type mapping information for an element defined in an XML schema document.
> [!IMPORTANT] > Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk.
Call this method only with trusted data.
For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).

Expands upon the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter> to provide additional functionality for typed datasets and generates internal mappings to .NET Framework types for XML schema element declarations, including literal XSD message parts in a WSDL document.
XMLSchemaType
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> that represents the root class for the Xml schema object model hierarchy and serves as a base class for classes such as the XmlSchema class.
An <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> class that represents a collection of XML schemas.

The base <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter"></xref> that generates internal mappings to .NET Framework types for XML schema element declarations, including literal XSD message parts in a WSDL document.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> to contain the generated code.
CodeNamespace
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"></xref> that specifies various options to use when generating .NET Framework types for use with an XML Web service.
The language specific <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"></xref> to use to generate the dataset.
Returns a <xref:System.String> representing the name of the typed dataset class.
Generates internal type mapping information for an element defined in an XML schema document.
> [!IMPORTANT] > Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk.
Call this method only with trusted data.
For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).

Expands upon the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter> to provide additional functionality for typed datasets and generates internal mappings to .NET Framework types for XML schema element declarations, including literal XSD message parts in a WSDL document.
A <xref:System.String> representing the name of the schema to import.
A <xref:System.String> representing the namespace of the XML schema.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> that represents the root class for the XML schema object model hierarchy and serves as a base class for classes such as the XmlSchema class.
An <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> class that represents a collection of XML schemas.

The base <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter"></xref> that generates internal mappings to .NET Framework types for XML schema element declarations, including literal XSD message parts in a WSDL document.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> to contain the generated code.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"></xref> that contains the generated dataset.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"></xref> that specifies various options to use when generating .NET Framework types for use with an XML Web service.
The language specific <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"></xref> to use to generate the dataset.
Returns a <xref:System.String> representing the name of the typed dataset class.
